mapper.select: SELECT resource_id id ,resource_commentCount commentCount,resource_introduce description,r.partition_id channelId, resource_title title ,resource_duration duration,resource_good goodCount,resource_favoriteCount favoriteCount,resource_click viewCount,resource_cover coverImg, resource_time contributeTime,r.user_id userId,u.user_nickname username ,u.user_head userAvatar,u.user_autograph userSign ,resource_content videoPath, p.partition_name channelName,p2.partition_id parentChannelId,p2.partition_name parentChannelName FROM `resource` r INNER JOIN `user` u on u.user_id=r.user_id INNER JOIN `partition` p on p.partition_id=r.partition_id INNER JOIN `partition` p2 on p2.partition_id=p.partition_first_id where r.resource_id = #{vid}
select * from ‘partition‘ where partition_first_id is null;
select label_id from label where label_name=#{name}
mapper.insert: insert into label_res values(8,(select label_id from label where label_name='${label_name}'),(select resource_id from resource where user_id=${user_id} order by resource_id desc limit 1));
mapper.select: select ${id} id,count(1) total,ceil(count(1)/${pageSize}) totalPage,${pageSize} pageSize,${currPage} currPage,${pageSize}*${currPage-1} start,${pageSize}*${currPage} end from (select * from user_id=${id})t
